reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and patient. Explains concepts clearly.
Excellent teacher! Made complex topics easy to understand.
Decent explanations, but sometimes goes off-topic.
Passionate about the subject. Great at fostering discussions.
Very helpful with programming concepts. Could improve on time management.
Excellent at teaching pronunciation and basic conversation skills.
Knowledgeable and encouraging. Sometimes moves too fast.
Good at explaining theories, but could use more real-world examples.
Extremely helpful. Breaks down complex reactions step-by-step.
Insightful discussions and relevant case studies. Could improve on feedback.
Excellent at explaining abstract concepts. Very patient with questions.
Provides great feedback on writing style. Sometimes hard to schedule.
Knowledgeable about the subject, but lectures can be dry.
Passionate and engaging. Makes the subject come alive.
Very thorough explanations. Homework assignments are challenging but helpful.
